channel.title: CVE Feed for sammartin -- Microsoft Clarity

item.title: CVE-2024-0590|2024-03-12T14:27:58.789Z -- sammartin -- microsoft%20clarity
item.description: The Microsoft Clarity plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 0.9.3. This is due to missing nonce validation on the edit_clarity_project_id() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the project id and add malicious JavaScript via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
